thread.title: NYC Spring Break trip
thread.title_full: NYC Spring Break trip - Review of The Ritz-Carlton New York, Central Park, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Julie V
title: NYC Spring Break trip
text:
This was our first trip to the Ritz in NYC and we really loved it. The staff was outstanding, the hotel was quiet, and we felt that the ambience and service really made our trip special. The location of the hotel is especially fabulous for anyone wishing to do Broadway or ballet.
CAREY from BEACHBUM VACATIONS booked our travel for us and she consistently does an OUTSTANDING job in helping us choose fantastic trip destinations.
